title: CFT Correlators from (0,2) Heterotic String
authors: Amit Giveon, Akikazu Hashimoto, David Kutasov
abstract:
In \cite{Giveon:2024fhz}, we argued that the (0,2) heterotic string gives
rise in spacetime to left and right-moving symmetric product CFT's. In this
paper we confirm this claim by showing that it computes correlation functions
in these CFT's.
